ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(Last_Shipment__r.Shipment_Status_Plann__c)='Confirmed', OR( NOT(ISCHANGED(Site_of_Load__c )), NOT(ISCHANGED(Site_of_Discharge__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Origin_Location__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Destination_Location__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: IMP001 - No es posible editar los campos de "site of load", "site of discharge", "Origin Location" o "Destination Location" una vez que el Shipment relacionado esta en Confirmed
